enrollmentSteps.title: Step 1: Fill Out Forms & Attach Requirements
enrollmentSteps.description: Fill out the enrollment form and attach the requirements.

enrollmentSteps.title: Step 2: Pay Enrollment and SSC Membership Fees
enrollmentSteps.description: Proceed to the cashier to settle the enrollment fee and SSC membership fee.

enrollmentSteps.title: Step 3: Submit Forms and Requirements
enrollmentSteps.description: Return to the Information Desk to submit your completed enrollment forms and attached requirements.

enrollmentSteps.title: Step 4: Entrance Exam
enrollmentSteps.description: Present your admission slip and take the entrance exam at the Guidance Office.

callToActionContent.heading: Ready to Enroll?
callToActionContent.description: We invite you to take the next step in providing your child with an exceptional education. Start your enrollment today or contact our Admissions Office with any questions.
